name: EditObject
notes: You can move the camera while editing by pressing and holding the spacebar (or W in vehicle) and moving your mouse.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Allows a player to edit an object (position and rotation) using their mouse on a GUI (Graphical User Interface).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that should edit the object.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object to be edited by the player.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. Success is reported when a non-existent object is specified, but nothing will happen.

 0: The function failed to execute. The player is not connected.
related_fn:
CreateObject: Create an object.
 DestroyObject: Destroy an object.
 MoveObject: Move an object.
 EditPlayerObject: Edit an object.
 EditAttachedObject: Edit an attached object.
 SelectObject: Select an object.
 CancelEdit: Cancel the edition of an object.
